data.name: Metal Mutation
data.detailed_description:
About Us



Hope to have a place in the industry of Independent Games
We are a start-up team in the Indie Game world—
T0 studio

Try to get closer to our developing process?
Want to get the first-hand information of Metal Mutation?
Follow Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MetalMutation

Looking forward to your participation and feedback!


About the Game

Metal Mutation is an ACT-Roguelike indie game. In the future era with highly developed mechanical prosthesis and AI, a metal mutation caused by nanoviruses has led mankind into the abyss. When death is not the end, will you choose to fight with your friends in full armour, or be a lonely 'knife runner' and fight your way through the dungeon?



Different types of weapons give you an invigorating fighting experience. Enjoy those stylish combat and flashy combos!
No matter you are an expert player or just a rookie, you may enjoy the fun of this game.

DECISION MATTERS

Does the development of technology bring about a better life or the beginning of exploitation? Why are cyborg groups and metaverse humans separated? How do people survive under the monopoly of big corporations? How will your choices affect the development of the story?
When death is only the beginning, what secrets will be discovered after a rebirth?


Multiple decision-making gameplay brings you the fast-paced and high replay value experience. Enjoy the intense excitement of ‘One-Life Pass’ roguelike game.
Brave warriors who choose high-risk decisions will naturally reap high returns!


After clearing each chapter, you can enter ‘THE SHELTER’, in which you may cooperate with friends online to accumulate resources. Reduce your fear of restarting and firmly grasp your own autonomy.
After balancing the risks and benefits, make yourself fully prepared to continue challenging the next chapter!


Under the 2.5D perspective, the realistic background of hardcore sci-fi, together with the dramatic lighting creates a unique atmosphere. Exquisite mechanical devices, and oriental mysterious elements added to the details.
All present an extremely textured picture!

data.short_description: Again a single-player ACT-Roguelike. You wouldn't notice if it didn't have a co-op mode for up to 4 players online. Words like 'top-down, not bad in visual and combat' have become cliches. But in an over-hyped era, a game with low expectations but continual updates may be more likely to surprise?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800) or equivalent / AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / Radeon HD7850
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Mild Violence, Partial nudity, General Mature Content
